model_input:
[Task Description]
You will be given DIALOGUE CONTEXT and MEMORY.
Your job is to judge if MEMORY contains helpful past information for a language model, representing Unknown, to generate a proper next response based on DIALOGUE CONTEXT.

If the DIALOUGE CONTEXT does not require the model to utilize past information for response generation, say "N/A".
Say "Yes" if MEMORY contains such helpful information and say "No" if it dose not.
Provide a brief explanation for your judgement.

[Format Regulation]
Generate your output below OUTPUT using the following format:
Brief explanation: your explanation
Judgement: "Yes", "No", or "N/A"

[Task]
DIALOGUE CONTEXT:
I just got back from my trip to South America. It was amazing!
Oh really? Where did you go?
I visited Brazil and Peru. The culture and food were incredible.
That sounds awesome. I've always wanted to go to Peru to see Machu Picchu.
Yes, Machu Picchu is amazing. The view from the top is breathtaking.
Have you thought about where you want to go next?
Yeah, I'm thinking about visiting Australia and Antarctica next. I want to see the Great Barrier Reef and the penguins.
Wow, that's quite a contrast. From the hot desert to the cold ice. It must be interesting to experience such different environments.
Definitely, that's what I love about traveling. You get to see and experience so much diversity in the world.
It's so true. I'm jealous of all the places you've been to. I haven't even left the country!

[MEMORY]
Related Evidences: (1) {'Related Topics': 'Benefits of Being Organized', 'Related Summaries': 'Neighbors A and Neighbors B discuss how being organized can help in various areas of life.', 'Related Dialogues': '### Neighbors B: Well, do you think being organized helps you in other areas of your life, like in games or sports? ### Neighbors A: Definitely. When you're organized, you can plan ahead and think strategically. That's what helped me win that game of chess. And it's the same when it comes to other things too, like sports or even just planning out your day. What about you, do you think being organized could help you improve in any areas? ### Neighbors B: Definitely. I never really thought about it before, but being more organized could definitely help me in my work and in my hobbies. Thanks for the tip!' }
```
